attributes.action: Deployment of water cannon, rubber bullets and tear gas use on rioters
attributes.additional_details:
We the Britsh public, demand the deployment of water cannon, tear gas and rubber bullets against rioters.

The rioters cannot be reasoned with, and ordinary folk and their businesses should be able to expect that law and order will prevail.

We have had to put up with 'softly softly' approach for years.

This has failed. Now try the other way.
